explains: adv. 有意识地，清楚地；有意地，故意地

sentences.en: Part of me was very frightened and I consciously had to get a grip on myself.
sentences.cn: 我其实非常害怕，但又不得不有意识地控制住自己。

sentences.en: Everybody consciously attends to things and everything is attended to.
sentences.cn: 人人自觉管，事事有人管。

sentences.en: A previous study noted that dolphins always consciously control their breathing.
sentences.cn: 之前的一项研究指出，海豚总是有意识地控制自己的呼吸。
